<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Request parameters for the update_nft endpoint","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Update an `NFT`'s visibility settings","required":["nft_id","visible"],"properties":{"nft_id":{"type":"string","description":"The `NFT` ID to update","example":"nft1..."},"visible":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the `NFT` should be visible in the UI","example":true}},"title":"UpdateNft"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
